welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Shirley, UK! Known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and discover all that this beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the busiest terminal, serving a variety of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the second busiest terminal, serving a variety of domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: One of the oldest terminals at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The main terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and Iberia.

wifi.note: Free for 45 minutes, with options for paid upgrades.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
